knimeNode.name: Spark Transformations Applier
knimeNode.shortDescription: Executes the transformation code generated by a PMML model.

intro.p: This node takes the PMML transformation model and compiles it into bytecode and runs it on the given data.
This node is typically used when test data shall be transformed e.g normalized the same way the training data has been transformed (e.g. using the "Spark Normalizer" node).

ports.inPort: Spark RDD requiring transformation of some or all columns.
ports.outPort: The input data transformed according to the input model.
